column1: Local Foods////Speaking of sides and soups
column2: I highly recommend the Lemongrass Chicken soup when it's available (usually in the winter). It is so warm and comforting and perfectly spiced. The Tuscan Kale
column3: with its combination of golden raisins
column6: made me fall in love with kale. The Acorn Squash and Quinoa are also good
column7: but I'm not fond of the Soba Noodles
column9: or Housemade Chips. The chips are actually kind of disappointing
column10: since potatoes are my #1 favorite food. They are made in-house
column11: but as a result are unevenly cooked
column12: with some burned and others oily and soggy.
